Node.definition: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
= a written record about the descendants of a particular person
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Lamech (לֶמֶךְ) descendant of Seth (שֵׁת) ► father of Shem (שֵׁם) Ham (חָם) Japheth (יֶפֶת)
= man; ◄ son of Noah (נֹחַ)
= man; ◄ son of Noah (נֹחַ)
= man; ◄ one of the three sons of Noah (נֹחַ) ► regarded as ancestor of various nations
= process by which females among humans or animals give birth to offspring through the process of conception, pregnancy, and labor; ≈ sometimes associated with painful toil and anxiety
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X takes place after Y has ceased existing or has been completed
= overflow of a large amount of water over dry land
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ one of the three sons of Noah (נֹחַ) ► regarded as ancestor of various nations

= man; ◄ son of Gomer (גֹּמֶר) descendant of Japheth (יֶפֶת) ► considered the founder of a nation with the same name
= man, also known as Diphath (דִּיפַת) ◄ son of Gomer (גֹּמֶר) descendant of Japheth (יֶפֶת) ► regarded to be the founder of a nation that cannot be identified with any certainty

= man; ◄ son of Javan (יָוָן) descendant of Japheth (יֶפֶת) ► regarded as the founder of a people with the same name
= town or region; ◄ probably located at the Iberian peninsula; described as inhabited by descendants of Javan (יָוָן) son of Japheth (יֶפֶת) ► famous for its commerce
= nation regarded as descendants of Javan (יָוָן) son of Japheth (יֶפֶת) possibly to be identified with Greece
= ethnic group, also known as Rodanim (רֹודָנִים) ◄ considered descendants of Javan (יָוָן) son of Japheth (יֶפֶת)
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
= action by which humans separate themselves from a larger group of people
= area located near the sea and/or the people living there; ≈ associated with commerce, remoteness, paganism, but also called on to acknowledge YHWH

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= point in time at which an event starts happening

= location where a community, family, or household lives
= location; ► one of the boundaries of the territory of the descendants of Joktan (יָקְטָן)

= an area dominated by elevations of the earth's surface

= man; ◄ son of Noah (נֹחַ)
= a particular group or class of either people (as in a clan or tribe) or animals (as in a genus or species) that share common characteristics
literally: tongue; hence: = a system of communication used by a community, ethnic group, or nation

= the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

= a large body of people united by common descent, religion, or language, inhabiting a particular state or territory, led by one common leader; often referring to the non Israelite nations, especially when used in plural
